summary: Phase 6A Onboarding Flow testing completed successfully. All 4 onboarding steps work correctly. New users are redirected to onboarding after signup. Existing users without onboarding completion are redirected to onboarding. Users with onboardingCompleted=true bypass onboarding and go to dashboard. Skip setup functionality works correctly.
passed_tests: Step 1 (Welcome) displays correctly with progress bar, welcome message, bullet points, and 'Get started' button
Step 2 (Profile Setup) has artist name input, genre dropdown, bio textarea with character counter
Step 3 (Choose Plan) shows all 3 tiers with prices, POPULAR badge on Tier II, and link to pricing page
Step 4 (Complete) shows personalized welcome message with artist name, next steps, and 'Go to my dashboard' button
Back navigation works between steps (Step 2 → Step 1)
Skip for now button works (Step 3 → Step 4)
Skip setup button redirects to dashboard and sets onboardingCompleted=true
Complete onboarding saves profile data and redirects to dashboard
Users with onboardingCompleted=true bypass onboarding when logging in
Dashboard does not redirect completed users back to onboarding
Progress bar updates correctly with each step (4 segments)
Form data (artist name, genre, bio) is properly captured
Pricing page link from onboarding works correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Added data-testid attributes to onboarding page for improved testability (artist-name-input, genre-select, bio-textarea, back-button, continue-button, skip-button, get-started-button, complete-button, step-indicator)

test_credentials.note: This user now has onboardingCompleted=true after testing

context_for_next_testing_agent: Onboarding flow is fully functional. Test user verifiedsoundmedia@gmail.com has completed onboarding and will go directly to dashboard. To test onboarding flow again, would need a new user or to manually set onboardingCompleted=false in Firestore. All 4 steps tested: Welcome, Profile Setup, Choose Plan, Complete. Skip functionality and back navigation both work correctly. Added data-testid attributes for future testing.
